DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study retrospectively analyze Clinical Nocturnal Polysomnographic Data ( Overnight Sleep Studies ) patient without Fibromyalgia . Fibromyalgia pain syndrome associate dysfunctional sleep , fatigue , frequent awakening , non-refreshing sleep , alpha frequency intrusion . Quantitative EEG routine Nocturnal Polysomnography use assess Alpha/Delta sleep . Hypothesis : Alpha intrusion may objective marker Fibromyalgia may correlate current clinical American College Rheumatology Criteria diagnosis Fibromyalgia .
DOC.brief_title: Quantitative EEG During PSG Patients With Without Fibromyalgia
DOC.detailed_description: This Retrospective Study patient without Fibromyalgia see private practice Aug 2007-July 2010 underwent Overnight Sleep Studies ( PSG ) The polysomnographic clinical data research subject diagnosis Fibromyalgia compare subject ' PSG Clinical data also refer Sleep Studies include Sleep Apnea , Narcolepsy , Periodic Limb Movement , Fatigue , Insomnia standard indication Overnight Sleep Studies . Clinical Data : Clinical Data point include follow : 1 . Research Study Number , 2 . Age , 3 . Gender , 4 . Body Mass Index , 5 . Epworth Sleepiness Scale ( self report scale Sleepiness ) , 6 . Fatigue Severity Scale ( self report scale Fatigue , 7 . American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) Criteria Fibromyalgia , 8 . Manual Tender Point Exam ( # anatomically specific tender points/18 ) , 9 . Medications : Benzodiazepines ( Bnz , Bnz ) , Tricyclic Antidepressants ( TCA ) Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors ( SSRIs SNRIs ) . Sleep Study Data Points : The follow data point capture Overnight Sleep Studies : 1 . Total Sleep Time , 2 . Sleep Efficiency , 3 . Wake After Sleep Onset , 4.Apnea/Hypopnea Index , 5 . Respiratory Distress Index , 6 . Periodic Limb Movement Index , 7 . Periodic Limb Movement Arousal Index , 8 . Quantitative EEG : Delta Event/Alpha Event Ratio .
DOC.criteria: Completed polysomnogram Complaints disorder sleep Age 18 80 inclusive Men woman History seizure use benzodiazepine use AEDs significant medical condition disorder sleep fibromyalgia would influence qEEG measure
